title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 354.4 - Coverage under retirement option elected
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 354.4 - Coverage under retirement option elected

State Regulations

Upon restoration to membership under this Part, the member
shall remain covered by any post-death benefit which was applicable at the time
of restoration and by the provisions of the option under which he or she last
retired, until which time the member attains death benefit eligibility in
connection with the member's return to active service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
354.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
